description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: gpac 2.3-DEV-rev921-g422b78ecf-master was discovered to contain an out of boundary read vulnerability via gf_dash_setup_period media_tools/dash_client.c:6374
Se descubrió que gpac 2.3-DEV-rev921-g422b78ecf-master contiene una vulnerabilidad de lectura fuera de los límites a través de gf_dash_setup_period media_tools/dash_client.c:6374
